channel.title: pgx on kw7oe
channel.description: Recent content in pgx on kw7oe

item.title: Writing PostgreSQL extension in Rust With pgx
item.description: Recently, I came across how to write a PostgreSQL extension in Rust with pgx from this article by pganalyze. I decided to play around with it. It turns out to be very straightforward to learn and write a PostgreSQL extension! pgx does make it easy to write a PostgreSQL extensions in Rust!
